definition: Min River, Sichuan
name of a river in Sichuan
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: The arid valleys of the Minjiang River is the worst ecotope in West China.
sentences.chinese: 岷江干旱河谷是我国西部生态环境最恶劣的地区之一。

sentences.english: Libing employed a method of channeling and dividing the water to harness the Minjiang Rivers.
sentences.chinese: 他用导流和深挖的手段来消除了岷江的水害。

sentences.english: Dangchang Tibetan is situated in Minjiang-River valley in Gansu province.
sentences.chinese: 宕昌藏族位于甘肃省岷江流域。

sentences.english: The Upper Reaches of Minjiang River served as ecological barriers and the major water supplying area to the Chengdu Plain.
sentences.chinese: 岷江上游是成都平原的生态屏障和水源生命线。

sentences.english: I not only opposed the construction of Zipingpu, but also the overdevelopment of the reservoirs on Minjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 我不仅反对兴建紫坪铺，而且过度的水库岷江。

sentences.english: Later records, Yu governance from the Minjiang water damage are the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 后人记载，禹治理水害是从岷江开始的。

sentences.english: This result is also useful to select appropriate incipient equation in Dujiangyan, Minjiang.
sentences.chinese: 为岷江都江堰河段合理选用卵石起动公式提供了依据。
